effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.

short_effect.x-y: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.x-y: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
